trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Minden
There were no other sightings in Minden on or around July 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke suddenly at 4:44am, got up, went to curtain, opened it to look at stars in Carson Valley, NV, I was at Ridge Tahoe and then a lite turned on in the middle of the stars and then went out, then it came on suddenly at bottom of the "stars," once, went out, then I thought I saw a plane on the right side of these very very bright stars vertically (they were HUGE) and then it was only there once, and never returned...I closed the curtains with a smile on my face thinking, "thank you," and went back to bed. OMG!
Summary: saw two bright lights, thought stars, then one light turned on in middle once then below once then on the right once
